title: can't launch game application
body: just suddenly find that I am not able to launch the game by using my Mac Pro when I am stay at home, however if I go to the uni, it can be launched successfully and quicker. just wondering what is wrong, and also when I go to my uncle's house the problem is still there

replies.body:
Hey,

This sounds like your Mac is fine, but there might be some kind of issue with your home connection and/or your uncle's.  Do you both use the same ISP?

I'd suggest a good start would be going through this [troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) while you're at home to see if you can identify the problem.

Cheers
Mindstar
